alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains West; North Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:58PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Big Horn County through 445 PM MDT... At 358 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Otto, or 8 miles west of Greybull, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Greybull around 410 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Medicine Wheel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains West; North Big Horn Basin
